# Welcome to PiTime
This website shows the index of the current time in [PI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pi) (ùúã), [E](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/E_(mathematical_constant)) (e), [PHI](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golden_ratio) (ùúô, ùúë) and [GAMMA](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Euler%27s_constant) (ùõæ) decimals. It is updated every second and shows the <ins>first</ins> instance of the concatenation of hours-minutes-seconds using the 24 hour format. 
_Example: 4:02:10 AM -> 16:02:10 -> 160210_.

The below tables show some special indices:

## Min, Max
### PI
| Index    | Time     |
|----------|----------|
| 49       | 10:58:20 |
| 22173595 | 14:25:24 |
### E
| Index    | Time     |
|----------|----------|
| 2        | 18:28:18 |
| 19227812 | 00:11:07 |
### PHI
| Index    | Time     |
|----------|----------|
| 2        | 18:03:39 |
| 23615707 | 11:32:33 |
### GAMMA
| Index    | Time     |
|----------|----------|
| 11       | 01:53:28 |
| 25981860 | 01:24:38 |

## Repetitions
### PI
| Index   | Time     |
|---------|----------|
| 4444    | 17:45:01 |
| 22222   | 16:00:51 |
### E
| Index | Time     |
|-------|----------|
| 55555 | 09:38:28 |
| 22222 | 07:49:04 |
### PHI
None
### GAMMA
| Index  | Time     |
|--------|----------|
| 999    | 02:37:34 |
| 11     | 01:53:28 |
| 111111 | 14:59:45 |

## Round numbers
### PI
None
### E
None
### PHI
| Index | Time     |
|-------|----------|
| 4000  | 13:48:30 |
### GAMMA
| Index | Time      |
|-------|-----------|
| 700000 | 16:46:43 |
| 20000  | 23:43:40 |
